name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, leveraging advanced skills in **C#**, **Java**, and cloud technologies such as **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**. Proficient in implementing **microservices** and **SOA** architectures, with a strong understanding of **Kafka** for real-time data processing and event-driven solutions. Adept at developing **CI/CD** pipelines and employing **TDD** methodologies to ensure high-quality code delivery within **Agile** frameworks, including **Kanban**.

Recognized for strong technical mentorship abilities and effective stakeholder communication to influence project outcomes. Background includes building AI/ML-powered platforms with hands-on expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and comprehensive experience with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong background in **MLOps**, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
